travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided in warm weather since Saturday and weak layers have gained strength. Where new snow is added on top, it may be temporarily unstable. Older snow should continue to strengthen.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather since Saturday and weak layers have gained strength. Where new snow is added on top, it may be temporarily unstable. Older snow should continue to strengthen.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluffs released in the area in warm weather and sunshine last weekend.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather since Saturday and weak layers have gained strength. The snow should continue to strengthen in mild weather the next days. New moist snow that is forecasted should generally bond well with existing snow.

snowpackStructure.highlights: In warm weather since Saturday, snow has subsided and partly melted. Weak layers in the snowpack seem to have gained strength. In stability tests 18.2., the weak layer broke at a higher additional load than a week earlier. Crystals had also rounded. Snow should continue to gain strength in mild weather the next days. Wet snow or sleet is forecasted in mountains, and it is expected to generally bond well with existing snow.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided in warm weather since Saturday and weak layers have gained strength. Where new snow is added on top, it may be temporarily unstable. Older snow should continue to strengthen.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather since Saturday and weak layers have gained strength. Where new snow is added on top, it may be temporarily unstable. Older snow should continue to strengthen.

weatherForecast.highlights: Smá vot snjókoma/slydda til fjalla í austanátt aðfaranótt þriðjudags, síðan hæg sunnanátt og styttir upp. Snjóar/slyddar með köflum í NA-átt á miðvikudag og á fimmtudagskvöld. Hiti í kringum frostmark fylgir úrkomunni en vægt frost þess á milli.

avalancheActivity.comment: A snowmobile triggered slab in Upsadalur above Dalvík 10.2.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has settled in the warming during the weekend but still a weak layer is persistent that shows quite easy propagation

snowpackStructure.highlights: The snow has settled in the warming during the weekend but still a weak layer is persistent. Stability tests in Skarðsdalur 16.2. showed quite easy propagation on the interface to the uppermost ice layer in the snowpack

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided in warm weather since Saturday and weak layers have gained strength. Where new snow is added on top, it may be temporarily unstable. Older snow should continue to strengthen.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather since Saturday and weak layers have gained strength. Where new snow is added on top, it may be temporarily unstable. Older snow should continue to strengthen.

weatherForecast.highlights: S- og svo SV-fræsingur með snjó í fjöll aðfaranótt þri. en snýst í snarpa NA-læga átt um tíma á mið. með snjókomu

avalancheActivity.comment: A slab avalanche released in Skagafell in Fagridalur 18/2. Sowmobile triggered an avalanche above Fáskrúðsfjörður 14/2. Avalanches in N-aspect in Seyðisfjörður and S-aspect in Eskifjörður and Norðfjörður 12/2.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather since Saturday and weak layers have gained strength. The snow should continue to strengthen in mild weather the next days. Considerable new snow might add and drift on Wednesday, but the weather forecast is rather uncertain.

snowpackStructure.highlights: In warm weather since Saturday, snow has subsided and partly melted. Snow on SM4 snow sensors has widely become isothermal throughout the snowpack. Weak layers seem to have gained strength and the snow should continue to strengthen in mild weather the next days. The weather forecast for Wednesday is rather uncertain but it might snow considerably and drift in strong E and SE winds. If the precipitation is dry cold snow, it might bond poorly with underlying snow. Moist snow would be preferable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided in warm weather since Saturday and weak layers have gained strength. Where new snow is added on top, it may be temporarily unstable. Older snow should continue to strengthen.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather since Saturday and weak layers have gained strength. Where new snow is added on top, it may be temporarily unstable. Older snow should continue to strengthen.

weatherForecast.highlights: Smá úrkoma í austanátt aðfaranótt þriðjudags, rigning á láglendi en snjókoma hátt til fjalla. Styttir upp með morgninum og dregur úr vindi.  Snjóar eða slyddar talsvert til fjalla í allhvössum eða hvössum A og SA áttum á miðvikudag. Einhver væta á fimmtudagskvöld. Hiti í kringum frostmark, aðeins óvissa í spánni.
